movies.title: Droid Runner 2049
movies.overview: A young droid runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former droid runner Rick Droid, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Wonder Droid
movies.overview: A Google droid comes to the world of Man to become the greatest of the droid superheroes.
